title: Pelosi: 'We Have to Act Now' on Gun Laws
description:
(5 Oct 2017) House Minority leader Nancy Pelosi says 'we take an oath to protect and defend the American people' and not having gun laws isn't protecting them.
Her comments come in the wake of the deadliest mass shooting in U.S. history over the weekend in Las Vegas.
Stephen Haddock killed 58 people and wounded hundreds of others.


You can license this story through AP Archive: http://www.aparchive.com/metadata/youtube/09ae22e36ced0d166cf111f74e72642a 
Find out more about AP Archive: http://www.aparchive.com/HowWeWork
